summary: Completed comprehensive testing of email/password authentication system. Backend APIs and frontend login flow working perfectly. Admin login, dashboard access, invalid credentials handling, and protected route redirects all functional.

minor_issues.issue: Health and root endpoints return HTML instead of JSON
minor_issues.impact: Non-API endpoints routed to frontend instead of backend

ui_bugs.issue: No visible logout button or user menu dropdown

passed_tests: Admin login with admin@servex.com and Servex2026! works perfectly
Dashboard shows 'Admin User' in header correctly
Invalid credentials show proper error message 'Invalid email or password'
Protected routes redirect unauthenticated users to landing page
Backend authentication APIs (login, logout, auth/me) all functional
Session management and cookie handling working
Demo account credentials displayed on login form
Form validation and error display working
action_item_for_main_agent: Add logout button/user menu dropdown to dashboard header. Currently users cannot log out through the UI (though session clearing works programmatically).
